reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: A very tight close-up shot on the face of one human adult female, mid-30s in perceived age, whose eyes are wide open in agony. The background is entirely consumed by harsh, screeching WHITE STATIC, suggesting complete sensory overload or a systemic failure. The lighting is overwhelmingly bright and uniform, reflecting off the skin.
text_prompt: Create an image following the given description: The frame is entirely pure BLACK. No discernible shapes, characters, or light sources are visible, indicating a complete void or cut to black. This frame should follow the overall style and look established by Image 0, but with the content entirely blacked out.
